function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low social distancing at home during the pandemic period","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission within the household","Mitigation":"Promoting and enforcing stricter social distancing measures at home","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Household members","Owner":"Public health authorities"},{"Description":"Frequent leaving of home during the pandemic period","Impact":"Increased exposure to potential sources of COVID-19 transmission outside the home","Mitigation":"Encouraging reduced non-essential outings and promoting safety measures when outside","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Participants who frequently leave home","Owner":"Individuals and employers"},{"Description":"High percentage of residences with multiple balconies","Impact":"Potential for increased spread of COVID-19 between adjacent balconies and residences","Mitigation":"Implementing barriers or partitions between balconies, promoting limited use of shared spaces, and enforcing social distancing guidelines","Technologies":"Physical barriers, air filtration systems","People":"Residents living in apartments with multiple balconies","Owner":"Property management, residents"}]}
